text: I have a creative team!! Let me ask them. What is your brief?
I would still research all of the companies - get your head around what is out there and what would suit you.
I just have to create a short film, it has be to longer then a minute. So it can be about anything and I think n that’s what I’m struggling with getting my mind around

I’ve come up with a few ideas but I don’t think their every good

I was thinking of doing a story following a teddy bear that gets passed down through the generations until it’s passed to the current generation and upon being given the teddy the child asks what kind of animal it is because it’s gone extinct.

Or I was thinking I could do something to do with movement to show off my animation skills and do a story of a Chinese dragon but I can’t think of a story like for.

And other then that my brain has crumbled haha
I don't blame you! That brief is FAR too wide!
Play to your strengths... what do you want to show off?

Later in my career I think I wanna try and do a bit of directing so I want to do something well thought out and and really nice visuals. I really wanna show that I can invent an interesting storyline with strong characters. I m thinking visually pleasing and I want to have really nice movement
